channel.title: defjaf tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from defjaf.

item.description:
@malcfairbairn @R_Trotta In fact they both ran unopposed so arguably less democratic. The appropriate thing is to call an election but there is no requirement, and neither did so immediately.

@malcfairbairn @R_Trotta … and Truss surely won’t.
item.source:markdown:
@malcfairbairn @R_Trotta In fact they both ran unopposed so arguably less democratic. The appropriate thing is to call an election but there is no requirement, and neither did so immediately.
@malcfairbairn @R_Trotta … and Truss surely won’t.

item.description: @cosmonist @thiagosgbr @AlkistisPou @AstroRoyalScot @thaisa_sb @telescoper @AlanHeavens @apontzen @AstroKatie This isn’t a problem only in academia (much less physics or astrophysics); is there any prior art out there? But the general issue of how to assess these skills (and to root out particularly bad actors) is worthy of thought.
item.source:markdown: @cosmonist @thiagosgbr @AlkistisPou @AstroRoyalScot @thaisa_sb @telescoper @AlanHeavens @apontzen @AstroKatie This isn’t a problem only in academia (much less physics or astrophysics); is there any prior art out there? But the general issue of how to assess these skills (and to root out particularly bad actors) is worthy of thought.

item.description: @AlanHeavens Are you recreating a tube car in your sitting room?
item.source:markdown: @AlanHeavens Are you recreating a tube car in your sitting room?

item.description: @playingwithdust So sorry, Brian. Thinking of you.
item.source:markdown: @playingwithdust So sorry, Brian. Thinking of you.
